title: Rising from the ashes, a symbol of hope at the Rose Parade
description: Survivors of the Eaton and Palisades Fires find healing and community working on a Rose Parade float to honor the lives and communities lost in last year's wildfires.
content: PASADENA, Calif. The 40-foot-long parade float dwarfed volunteer Darlene Leyba as she attached flowers to bald spots of exposed wire mesh. As per Rose Parade rules, every inch of the float must be de… [+4150 chars]
de: Aus der Asche auferstanden, ein Symbol der Hoffnung beim Rosenumzug. Überlebende der Brände von Eaton und Palisades finden Heilung und Gemeinschaftsarbeit auf einem Rosenparade-Wagen, um die Leben und Gemeinschaften zu ehren, die bei den Waldbränden im letzten Jahr verloren gingen.
en: Rising from the ashes, a symbol of hope at the Rose Parade. Survivors of the Eaton and Palisades Fires find healing and community working on a Rose Parade float to honor the lives and communities lost in last year's wildfires.
la: Oriens e cinere, Rosae spei symbolum. Superstites Incendium Eaton et Palisades sanationem et communitatem in parade Rosa natant laborantes inveniunt ad vitam et communitates amissas in incendiis proximis anni colendis.

title: Residents urged to prepare this bushfire season
description: Yarrambat CFA is calling for residents to plan for their family’s safety this summer. Captain Andrew Napoleone said CFA volunteers often meet people who are hesitant to prepare for fires. “They are not sure when to prepare for summer, think it’s going to be t…
content:
Yarrambat CFA is calling for residents to plan for their familys safety this summer. 
Captain Andrew Napoleone said CFA volunteers often meet people who are hesitant to prepare for fires. 
They are… [+938 chars]
de: Die Anwohner werden aufgefordert, sich auf die Buschfeuersaison vorzubereiten. Yarrambat CFA fordert die Bewohner auf, diesen Sommer für die Sicherheit ihrer Familien zu sorgen. Kapitän Andrew Napoleone sagte, CFA-Freiwillige treffen oft auf Menschen, die zögern, sich auf Brände vorzubereiten. „Sie sind sich nicht sicher, wann sie sich auf den Sommer vorbereiten sollen, sie denken, dass es soweit sein wird …“
en: Residents urged to prepare this bushfire season. Yarrambat CFA is calling for residents to plan for their family’s safety this summer. Captain Andrew Napoleone said CFA volunteers often meet people who are hesitant to prepare for fires. “They are not sure when to prepare for summer, think it’s going to be t…
la: Residentibus suasit ut hoc rubicundum tempus pararet. Yarrambat CFA incolas vocat ut hac aestate consilium de salute familiae suae. Praefectus Andreae Napoleone dixit CFA voluntarios saepe congredi hominibus timidos ad incendia parandos. “Certe non sunt cum aestatem parant, putes eum futurum t….

title: Family watches Boddington heritage property burn in Christmas Day fire
description: Two heritage homes and thousands of hectares of land were lost in a Christmas Day bushfire in Boddington.
content:
Ray Farmer points at two cast iron bed frames, nestled in the smouldering ruins of the home he raised his children in.
"Those were the boys' beds, from when they were little," Mr Farmer said.
His t… [+3141 chars]
de: Familie sieht zu, wie das historische Anwesen Boddington am Weihnachtstag in Brand gerät. Bei einem Buschfeuer am Weihnachtstag in Boddington gingen zwei denkmalgeschützte Häuser und Tausende Hektar Land verloren.
en: Family watches Boddington heritage property burn in Christmas Day fire. Two heritage homes and thousands of hectares of land were lost in a Christmas Day bushfire in Boddington.
la: Familiam Boddington custodit possessionem hereditatis tus in Natali igne. Perierunt duae possessiones domos et mille hectares terre in Natale Domini rubicundi apud Boddington.

title: Breaking: Mundaring residents urged to leave now as bushfire dangerously close to homes
description: EmergencyWA says a bushfire warning is in place for people in parts of Boya, Darlington, Greenmount, Helena Valley and Hovea.
content:
Residents in Mundaring have been asked to leave immediately if safe to do so as an emergency level bushfire burns in the area, about 35 kilometres east of Perth.
The warning is for people in an area… [+455 chars]
de: Eilmeldung: Anwohner von Mundaring werden aufgefordert, ihr Zuhause zu verlassen, da das Buschfeuer gefährlich nahe an ihren Häusern liegt. Laut EmergencyWA gilt für Menschen in Teilen von Boya, Darlington, Greenmount, Helena Valley und Hovea eine Buschfeuerwarnung.
en: Breaking: Mundaring residents urged to leave now as bushfire dangerously close to homes. EmergencyWA says a bushfire warning is in place for people in parts of Boya, Darlington, Greenmount, Helena Valley and Hovea.
la: Breaking: Mundaring incolas hortatus est ut nunc relinqueret ut bushfire periculose prope domos. EmergencyWA dicit Bushfire monitionem pro hominibus in partibus Boya, Darlington, Greenmount, Helena Vallis et Hovea locum esse dicit.

title: Protest to Demand Answers from Gavin Newsom and Karen Bass on Anniversary of the Palisades Wildfire
description: Scores of fire survivors plan to gather on the one-year anniversary of the devastating Pacific Palisades wildfire to pose questions to California Gov. Gavin Newsom and Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass — but so far there’s no word that they will show up to answer …

de: Protest, um Antworten von Gavin Newsom und Karen Bass zum Jahrestag des Palisades-Lauffeuers zu fordern. Zahlreiche Brandüberlebende planen, sich am ersten Jahrestag des verheerenden Waldbrandes in den Pacific Palisades zu versammeln, um Fragen an den kalifornischen Gouverneur Gavin Newsom und die Bürgermeisterin von Los Angeles, Karen Bass, zu stellen – aber bisher gibt es kein Wort darüber, dass sie zur Beantwortung erscheinen werden …

Gavin Newsom et Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass — sed tantum verbum non est ut respondeant ...

title: No, Yale Climate Connections, Dramatic Photos Don’t Prove Climate Change Effects
description: By substituting photographs for trends and models for measurements, Yale Climate Connections misleads readers into believing that six images can “show how climate change shaped our world.” They cannot. Climate is measured over decades, not captured in a frame…
content: The recent article in Yale Climate Connections, Six photos show how climate change shaped our world in 2025, by Samantha Harrington, presents a photo-driven narrative asserting that wildfires, floods… [+7188 chars]
de: Nein, Yale-Klimazusammenhänge, dramatische Fotos beweisen keine Auswirkungen des Klimawandels. Indem Yale Climate Connections Trends durch Fotos und Messungen durch Modelle ersetzt, verleitet Yale Climate Connections die Leser zu der Annahme, dass sechs Bilder „zeigen können, wie der Klimawandel unsere Welt geprägt hat“. Sie können es nicht. Das Klima wird über Jahrzehnte gemessen und nicht in einem Rahmen erfasst …
en: No, Yale Climate Connections, Dramatic Photos Don’t Prove Climate Change Effects. By substituting photographs for trends and models for measurements, Yale Climate Connections misleads readers into believing that six images can “show how climate change shaped our world.” They cannot. Climate is measured over decades, not captured in a frame…
la: No, Yale Climate Connectiones, Dramaticae Imagines Non probare Clima Mutationis Effectus. Subpositis photographis pro trends et exemplaribus mensurarum, Connexiones Yale Clima lectores seducit ad credendum quod sex imagines "ostendere possunt quomodo mutatio climatis nostri mundi conformetur". Non possunt. Clima mensuratur super decenniis, non capitur in tabulis...

title: Strict wildfire safety rules will soon apply to much of urban San Diego
description: New regulations will require homeowners to remove combustible materials, including wood fencing, sheds and landscaping, from a five-foot buffer zone surrounding a home's outer walls.
content:
San Diego is preparing to enforce new wildfire safety regulations that ban landscaping and flammable materials within five feet of most homes in the city.
Last month, the San Diego City Council adop… [+2413 chars]
de: In weiten Teilen der Stadt San Diego gelten bald strenge Waldbrandschutzvorschriften. Neue Vorschriften verlangen von Hausbesitzern, brennbare Materialien, einschließlich Holzzäunen, Schuppen und Landschaftsbau, aus einer fünf Fuß großen Pufferzone rund um die Außenwände eines Hauses zu entfernen.
en: Strict wildfire safety rules will soon apply to much of urban San Diego. New regulations will require homeowners to remove combustible materials, including wood fencing, sheds and landscaping, from a five-foot buffer zone surrounding a home's outer walls.
la: Ignium ferum stricte ad multam urbanam San Diego praecepta salutis mox dabunt. Novae ordinationes homeowners requirent ut materias combustibiles removeant, inclusa silvae saepiendi, fundes et capaces, e zona quiddam quinque pedum circum domum muri exterioris.

title: Colorado weather: Red flags warnings issued for critical fire danger
description: "Conditions will be favorable for rapid fire spread," forecasters said in the red flag warning. "Avoid outdoor burning and any activity that may produce a spark and start a wildfire."
content:
Strong winds and low humidity prompted red flag warnings for “critical fire weather conditions” on Sunday across the foothills and southern metro area, according to the National Weather Service.
The… [+930 chars]
de: Wetter in Colorado: Warnungen mit roten Flaggen wegen kritischer Brandgefahr. „Die Bedingungen werden für eine schnelle Brandausbreitung günstig sein“, sagten Meteorologen in der Warnmeldung. „Vermeiden Sie das Verbrennen im Freien und alle Aktivitäten, die einen Funken erzeugen und einen Flächenbrand auslösen könnten.“
en: Colorado weather: Red flags warnings issued for critical fire danger. "Conditions will be favorable for rapid fire spread," forecasters said in the red flag warning. "Avoid outdoor burning and any activity that may produce a spark and start a wildfire."
la: Colorado weather: Rubra vexilla admonitiones pro periculo ignis discrimine edita. "Condiciones fausta rapido spargentur igne" vatem dixerunt in Vexillum rubeum monitum. "Vita evita ardentem et omnem actionem quae scintillam producat et ignem ferum inceperit".

title: Manitobans likely to see higher premiums, limited insurance options after devastating wildfire season: expert
description: Manitobans should expect higher cabin and home insurance premiums in 2026, one expert says, after a 2025 fire season that destroyed at least 130 properties in the province.
content: Manitobans should expect higher cabin and home insurance premiums in 2026, one expert says, after a 2025 fire season that destroyed at least 130 properties in the province and forced more than 32,000… [+6594 chars]
de: Manitobaner werden nach der verheerenden Waldbrandsaison wahrscheinlich höhere Prämien und begrenzte Versicherungsmöglichkeiten erleben: Experte. Manitobaner sollten im Jahr 2026 mit höheren Versicherungsprämien für Hütten und Häuser rechnen, sagt ein Experte, nachdem im Jahr 2025 eine Brandsaison in der Provinz mindestens 130 Immobilien zerstört hatte.
en: Manitobans likely to see higher premiums, limited insurance options after devastating wildfire season: expert. Manitobans should expect higher cabin and home insurance premiums in 2026, one expert says, after a 2025 fire season that destroyed at least 130 properties in the province.
la: Manitobans verisimile praemiis altioribus visurus, optiones assecurationis limitatas, post ignem ferum devastatum temporum: periti. Manitobani altiorem casulam et premiums assecurationis anno 2026 exspectare debent, unus peritus dicit, post 2025 tempus ignis, qui saltem 130 possessiones in provincia delevit.

title: LA fire studies show the risks as wildfire smoke lingered inside homes
description: When cities burn, plastics, electronics, cleaning chemicals and much more create a toxic brew. Studies underway after the LA fires show exposure is often strongest inside homes.
content:
Smoke rolls up a hillside from the Palisades Fire on Jan. 11, 2025, in Los Angeles. AP Photo/Eric Thayer
When wildfires began racing through the Los Angeles area on Jan. 7, 2025, the scope of the di… [+7859 chars]
de: Brandstudien in LA zeigen die Risiken, wenn der Rauch von Waldbränden in Häusern zurückbleibt. Wenn Städte brennen, entsteht ein giftiges Gebräu aus Kunststoffen, Elektronik, Reinigungschemikalien und vielem mehr. Studien, die nach den Bränden in Los Angeles durchgeführt wurden, zeigen, dass die Belastung häufig in Häusern am stärksten ist.
en: LA fire studies show the risks as wildfire smoke lingered inside homes. When cities burn, plastics, electronics, cleaning chemicals and much more create a toxic brew. Studies underway after the LA fires show exposure is often strongest inside homes.
la: LA Ignis studia pericula monstrant sicut fumus ferum intra domos commoratus est. Cum urbes ardent, materia plastica, electronica, chemicae purgandae et multo magis celia toxica creant. Studiis comparatis post LA ignes detectionem saepe fortissimis intra domos ostendunt.

content:
It’s been nearly one year since a devastating wildfire tore through the tight-knit coastal enclave of Pacific Palisades but the anger in the community hasn’t cooled its hardened.

de: „Wir mussten brennen“: Ein Jahr nach dem Palisades-Brand. Ein Jahr nach dem Waldbrand in Palisades sagen Einwohner Kaliforniens, dass die Misserfolge von Newsom und Bass sie verwundbar gemacht haben, und fordern Rechenschaftspflicht.
en: ‘We were left to burn’: One year after the Palisades fire. One year after the Palisades wildfire, California residents say failures by Newsom and Bass left them vulnerable and are demanding accountability.
la: Item uno anno post Palisades incendium. Uno anno post Palisades incendium ferum, California incolarum defectionem per Newsom et Bass dicunt vulnerabiles reliquerunt et rationem reddere exigunt.

title: Can We Save Wine from Wildfires?
description: Nicola Twilley reports on Tom Collins and Elizabeth Tomasino, two of the scientists trying to find a solution to smoke taint, which has cost the wine industry billions of dollars.
content: Although many wine drinkers have remained blissfully ignorant of this addition to wildfires already heavy toll, it has been disastrous for winemakers. One analyst concluded that the 2020 wildfires co… [+4460 chars]
de: Können wir Wein vor Waldbränden retten? Nicola Twilley berichtet über Tom Collins und Elizabeth Tomasino, zwei der Wissenschaftler, die versuchen, eine Lösung für den Rauchgeschmack zu finden, der die Weinindustrie Milliarden von Dollar gekostet hat.
en: Can We Save Wine from Wildfires?. Nicola Twilley reports on Tom Collins and Elizabeth Tomasino, two of the scientists trying to find a solution to smoke taint, which has cost the wine industry billions of dollars.
la: Possumusne Vinum ex Wildfires? Nicola Twiley refert in Tom Collins et Elizabeth Tomasino, duo viri docti solutionem fumi labem invenire conantur, quae industriam miliardorum dollariorum vini constat.

title: Wildfire Smoke is Killing Tens of Thousands of Americans Every Year

content:
San Francisco at noon on September 9, 2020, as wildfire smoke blanketed the Bay Area..Santiago Mejia/San Francisco Chronicle via Getty/Grist
Get your news from a source thats not owned and controlle… [+7950 chars]
de: Der Rauch von Waldbränden tötet jedes Jahr Zehntausende Amerikaner. Diese Geschichte wurde ursprünglich von Grist veröffentlicht und wird hier im Rahmen der Zusammenarbeit mit Climate Desk wiedergegeben. Der Rauch von Waldbränden ist eine aufkommende landesweite Krise für die Vereinigten Staaten. Durch den Klimawandel angeheizt, schwellen Brände zu Monstern an, die verzehren …
en: Wildfire Smoke is Killing Tens of Thousands of Americans Every Year. This story was originally published by Grist and is reproduced here as part of the Climate Desk collaboration. Wildfire smoke is an emerging nationwide crisis for the United States. Supercharged by climate change, blazes are swelling into monsters that consum…
la: INCAENDIUM fumus occidit decem milia Americae quotannis. Haec fabula a Grist primo divulgata est atque hic ut pars cooperationis Desk Climati repraesentetur. Ignium incendium est discrimen nationale emergens pro Civitatibus Foederatis. Magno cum mutatione climatis, ardores in monstris quae consumunt.

title: LA fires 1 year later: Chemicals from smoke lingered inside homes long after the wildfires were out – studies tracked the harm
description: When cities burn, plastics, electronics, cleaning chemicals and much more create a toxic brew. Studies launched during the LA fires a year ago show exposure is often strongest inside homes.
content:
Smoke rolls up a hillside from the Palisades Fire on Jan. 11, 2025, in Los Angeles. AP Photo/Eric Thayer
When wildfires began racing through the Los Angeles area on Jan. 7, 2025, the scope of the di… [+7860 chars]
de: Brände in LA ein Jahr später: Chemikalien aus dem Rauch verblieben noch lange nach dem Ende der Waldbrände in den Häusern – Studien untersuchten die Schäden. Wenn Städte brennen, entsteht ein giftiges Gebräu aus Kunststoffen, Elektronik, Reinigungschemikalien und vielem mehr. Studien, die während der Brände in Los Angeles vor einem Jahr gestartet wurden, zeigen, dass die Belastung oft in Häusern am stärksten ist.
en: LA fires 1 year later: Chemicals from smoke lingered inside homes long after the wildfires were out – studies tracked the harm. When cities burn, plastics, electronics, cleaning chemicals and much more create a toxic brew. Studies launched during the LA fires a year ago show exposure is often strongest inside homes.
la: LA incendia 1 post annum: Chemical ex fumo intra domos diu commoratus est postquam incendia ignium sunt exstinctae - studium detrimenti perscrutatus est. Cum urbes ardent, materia plastica, electronica, chemicae purgandae et multo magis celia toxica creant. Studia per LA ignes immissa per annum ante ostendunt detectionem saepe fortissimas intra domos.

title: A year after the LA wildfire disaster, key numbers show how it unfolded and the toll left behind
description: On Jan 6, 2024, the weather was primed for severe wildfire danger, with wind gusts reaching 90 miles per hour.
content: LOS ANGELES (AP) A year after twin infernos tore across opposite ends of Los Angeles County, the scars are still visible. Thousands of homes were reduced to rubble, with rebuilding slow, and the deat… [+3740 chars]
de: Ein Jahr nach der Waldbrandkatastrophe in L.A. zeigen wichtige Zahlen, wie sie sich entwickelte und wie hoch die Opferzahlen waren. Am 6. Januar 2024 war das Wetter mit Windböen von bis zu 90 Meilen pro Stunde auf schwere Waldbrandgefahr vorbereitet.
en: A year after the LA wildfire disaster, key numbers show how it unfolded and the toll left behind. On Jan 6, 2024, the weather was primed for severe wildfire danger, with wind gusts reaching 90 miles per hour.
la: Annus post LA calamitatem ignem ferum, numeri clavis monstrant quomodo explicatur et theloneum relictum est. Die 6 mensis Ianuarii anno 2024 tempestas ad gravem ignem ferum instructa est, cum procellis ad 90 milia passuum per horae ventum est.

title: These numbers tell the story of the Los Angeles wildfires, one year later

la: Hi numeri fabulam Los Angeles wildfires uno anno post narrant. Tantum octo domicilia eatenus reaedificata sunt.

title: LA fire victims have just bills and broken promises 1 year after Palisades blaze: ‘They let us burn’
description: New building permits have been issued for just 646 new homes and businesses, according to city data, and a recent survey found that only 13% of homeowners have begun construction.
content:
LOS ANGELES Thousands of Pacific Palisades residents were left with nothing last year after a deadly wildfire ripped through the world-famous neighborhood and burned nearly 7,000 homes to ash.
Homeo… [+10495 chars]
de: Ein Jahr nach dem Brand in Palisades haben die Brandopfer in LA nur Rechnungen und gebrochene Versprechen erhalten: „Sie haben uns brennen lassen.“ Nach Angaben der Stadt wurden nur für 646 neue Häuser und Unternehmen neue Baugenehmigungen erteilt, und eine aktuelle Umfrage ergab, dass nur 13 % der Hausbesitzer mit dem Bau begonnen haben.
en: LA fire victims have just bills and broken promises 1 year after Palisades blaze: ‘They let us burn’. New building permits have been issued for just 646 new homes and businesses, according to city data, and a recent survey found that only 13% of homeowners have begun construction.
la: LA ignitae victimae iustae libellos habent et promissiones fractas 1 anno postquam Palisades ardent: 'uremus'. Novum aedificium permittit in tantum 646 novas domos et negotia, secundum urbis notitias editas esse, et recens circumspectis inventum solum 13% possessorum constructionem instituisse.

title: After devastating LA fires, California is drafting nation's toughest rules for homes

Einige Hausbesitzer schrecken davor zurück, ihr Grün zu verlieren.
en: After devastating LA fires, California is drafting nation's toughest rules for homes. California is writing rules to limit plants around buildings to protect them from wildfires, after the Los Angeles fires a year ago. Some homeowners are pushing back over losing their greenery.

de: Inmitten der Trauer über den Waldbrand säte eine Bewohnerin aus der Gegend von Los Angeles dort, wo einst ihr Zuhause stand, Sonnenblumen und Hoffnung. ALTADENA, Kalifornien (AP) – Missi Dowd-Figueroa erweckte das vom Feuer verwüstete Grundstück, auf dem einst ihr Haus stand, wieder zum Leben – eine Sonnenblume nach der anderen. Die ausgebildete Krankenschwester und Mutter von drei Kindern verlor ihr Haus im Landhausstil aus dem Jahr 1898 beim Feuer in Eaton, einem von zwei tödlichen Waldbränden …

title: Unrest in Iran: how the latest protests spread like wildfire
description: Deep-rooted discontent at the country’s ‘entire regime’ and economic concerns have sparked widespread protest far beyond Tehran
content: It’s astonishing how quickly the flames of protest have spread across Iran, said Ara. On Sunday 28 December, a couple of small protests in central Tehran, one outside the Alaeddin mobile phone centre… [+4495 chars]
de: Unruhen im Iran: Wie sich die jüngsten Proteste wie ein Lauffeuer ausbreiteten. Die tief verwurzelte Unzufriedenheit mit dem „gesamten Regime“ des Landes und wirtschaftliche Bedenken haben weit über Teheran hinaus zu weit verbreiteten Protesten geführt
en: Unrest in Iran: how the latest protests spread like wildfire. Deep-rooted discontent at the country’s ‘entire regime’ and economic concerns have sparked widespread protest far beyond Tehran
la: In Irania inquietas: quomodo novissimae protestationes sicut ignis ignem diffundunt. Tristitia alta radicata in patriae totius regimen et cura oeconomica diffusa protestatione longe ultra Tehran commoverunt.
